com.darkfoxdev.tesi.targetlint

Interface LintDetectorInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UastDetector

    public interface LintDetectorInterface
    The Lint detector interface it's the contact point between Android Lint and TargetLint. The object implementing this interface is in charge of:
    • converting the AST to TLAST
    • instantiating the TLBridge and notify of the creation of a new TLElement
    • generating the report for Android Lint
     

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void report(TLIssue issue, Match match, java.lang.String message)
      Generates the report for Android Lint.
      void reportError(java.lang.String message)
      Report an error message using the TargetLint Logger.

      • reportError

        void reportError(java.lang.String message)
        Report an error message using the TargetLint Logger. It's used for debugging a TargetLint detector.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
